lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Ward Connerly, a University of California regent, states (front page, April 18) that "preferences at this point are not just reverse discrimination, they're degrading to the people who accept them." Tell this to those preferred in university admissions because they are athletes, veterans or children of alumni. Where are the standards or legislation to ban these preferences?

headline.main: Don't Turn Back on Affirmative Action
